name: Save Scummer (mostlyfictional)
description:
SaveScummer is a simple top down shooter with a time travel mechanic. Take a snapshot of a situation, and you can travel back in time to that moment. Your original self will carry out your actions, leaving you free to slip past enemies or carry out a multi-directional assault.

This version doesn't have any wider objective - enemies will spawn in from time to time and you have infinite lives. Just play about with the time travel and see what you think.

Controls

--------

Controller:

Left stick or d-pad to move

Right stick or A to shoot

Left trigger to take a snapshot

Right trigger to resume from snapshot

Keyboard:

Cursor keys to move

Z to shoot

C to take a snapshot

V to resume from a snapshot
